participant_1.background:
I was looking for a new challenge and opportunity to grow in my career.
my mother is a teacher.
my favorite thing to do is to read books on the beach.
i was accepted to participate.
I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together.
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
i play jazz piano in a band.
I run track for myself.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

content.text: Hey, what are you up to today?
I am going to go running in a bit. Do you run?
I used to run, but not so much anymore. I mostly like to read on the beach.
That sounds really relaxing. I love reading, too.
What kind of things do you like to read?
I love reading nonfiction, especially science and history.
My favorite thing to read is fiction. I love getting lost in a good story.
I do like to read some fiction, but it's not my favorite.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, and I also love the Hunger Games series.
I've heard good things about those books. I've never read them, though.
You should definitely check them out. They're really good.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
